box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: follower 副本从 leader 拉取消息，写到本地磁盘后，会更新其 LEO 值

switch.text: follower 副本从 leader 拉取消息，写到本地磁盘后，会更新其 LEO 值

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 314px; height: 1px; padding-top: 150px; margin-left: 286px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: leader 副本接收到 producer 发送的消息，写到本地磁盘后，会更新其 LEO 值

switch.text: leader 副本接收到 producer 发送的消息，写到本地磁盘后，会更新其 LEO 值

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 314px; height: 1px; padding-top: 210px; margin-left: 286px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: follower 从 leader 副本拉取消息时，会告知 leader 起始拉取位置（就是follower的LEO），leader 副本使用该位移值更新 remote 副本 LEO。

switch.text: follower 从 leader 副本拉取消息时，会告知 leader 起始拉取位置（就是follower的LEO），leader 副本使用该位移值更新 remote 副本...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 314px; height: 1px; padding-top: 270px; margin-left: 286px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: follower 更新完LEO值后，比较改值与leader发来的HW，取两者中较小值作为follower副本的HW。

switch.text: follower 更新完LEO值后，比较改值与leader发来的HW，取两者中较小值作为follower副本的HW。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 314px; height: 1px; padding-top: 330px; margin-left: 286px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
主要有两个更新时机：
1）leader副本更新自身LEO后。
2）更新remote副本LEO后。
算法：max（leader当前HW值，min（remote副本LEO））

switch.text: 主要有两个更新时机：1）leader副本更新自身LEO后。...

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
